definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
Emperor Taizong of Tang (727-779), reign name of ninth Tang emperor Li Yu 李豫[Li3 Yu4], reigned 762-779

sentences.english: It was designed by Master Monk Xuanzang of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 是唐代的玄奘大师亲自设计的。

sentences.english: The practice is a picture of the tang dynasty beaten ZhangXuan painter works.
sentences.chinese: 《捣练图》是唐代画家张萱之作。

sentences.english: The Chinese of the Tang Dynasty didn't do it.
There were many Taoist sects in the T'ang Dynasty, in which, the Shangqing Sect had the most important influence.
sentences.chinese: 在唐代众多的道教派别中，上清派的影响最大。

sentences.english: The term of office is an important system for managing the heads of counties in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 任期制是唐代对县令进行管理的重要措施。

sentences.english: Mingfa is one of the subjects of imperial examinations in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明法是唐代科举考试的科目之一。

sentences.english: A legendary old man collected a precious imperial carriage of the Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 一位传奇老人收藏有唐代的珍品銮舆。

sentences.english: And it was the poems composing in play itself to get considerable development in the Tang Dynasty too.
sentences.chinese: 并且戏作诗本身也是在唐代得到长足的发展的。

sentences.english: As a folk-art in ancient China, the image of Zhongkui came into being in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 锺馗作为古代的民俗艺术，出现在唐代。

sentences.english: Bohai regime of Tang Dynasty had a frequent intercourse with Japan.
sentences.chinese: 唐代渤海政权与日本隔海相望，往来频繁。

sentences.english: Li Bai was a Tang poet of superb talent.
sentences.chinese: 李白是唐代一位才气横溢的诗人。

sentences.english: Jian Ming Yuan was compiled by Yuan Nian who was Buddhist monk in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《兼名苑》是唐代僧人释远年编纂的类书。

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty was a blooming period of women′s toilette, especially in painting eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 唐代是妇女妆饰十分繁盛的一个时期，尤以眉妆为最。

sentences.english: It was a colorful page of history in Tang dynasty classics.
sentences.chinese: 唐代经学是经学史上的一抹异彩。

sentences.english: The Four Masterworks by Tang Xianzu drew materials from the novels of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “临川四梦”直接或间接地取材于唐代小说。

sentences.english: Yang Huizhi, was honored as a divine sculptor was an outstanding representative during the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 被誉为雕塑圣手的杨惠之就是唐代杰出的代表。

definition: Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
